a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population in multidimensional poverty: Urban vs. rural, 2020
Multidimensional poverty is defined as being deprived in a range of health, education and living standards indicators.
Source: Alkire, Kanagaratnam and Suppa (2022), The global Multidimensional Poverty Index (MPI) 2022
Note: Estimates based on the most recent household survey data (between 2010 and 2020). A separate dataset is produced to monitor trends
